attributes.action: refuse to allow the Holocaust-denying, anti-semitic, anti-Muslim, racist and homophobic British National Party to be represented in any way at the Buckingham Palace garden party on July 21st or any other date.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Richard Barnbrook, the BNP's London Assembly member, intends to attend the garden party at Buckingham Palace on July 21st along with BNP leader Nick Griffin. This needs to be stopped.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot host party political material, such as references to political parties. More guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
